title.narrative: Technical support of trained CSOs for the production in social media in Cote d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Results. - 15 productions were realized by only 5 CSOs. These productions focused on topics related to gender-based violence, the representation of women in elected assemblies and the rights of the child. - These publications reached more than 1,600 people, including 800 on Facebook, and 650 on Twitter.
the 10 CSOs supervised by bloggers had to produce during this quarter These publications should address the issues of gender-based violence and women's political participation in Côte d'Ivoire
